text: Happy Sunday y’all! I’m interested in implementing the C Data Interface for Apache Arrow, which should allow us to reuse pyarrow’s memory in Julia in a zero-copy way. I’ve translated the <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/format/CDataInterface.html|Structure Definitions> to Julia using Clang.jl, but I’m not sure where to go from here. Does anyone have ideas?

text: The README for Arrow.jl states that it doesn’t support the C data interface <https://github.com/JuliaData/Arrow.jl>
